definition: of or relating to the early Saxons or Anglo-Saxons and their descendents, especially the English or Lowland Scots, and their language
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the early Saxons or Anglo-Saxons and their descendents, especially the English or Lowland Scots, and their language
= example: of or relating to the early Saxons or Anglo-Saxons and their descendents, especially the English or Lowland Scots, and their language
